movie.title: Danny's Game
movie.description_intro: Danny Bishop is a gambling prodigy. After exiling himself to prison, he returns to his brothers home only to find himself back in the game because of a large debt for his protection in prison. He cons a group of high stakes gamblers, including his vicious rival, Alex, to a tournament. The story is a delicate balance between the tension of the game and the strained relationship with his brother.
movie.description_full: Danny Bishop is a gambling prodigy. After exiling himself to prison, he returns to his brothers home only to find himself back in the game because of a large debt for his protection in prison. He cons a group of high stakes gamblers, including his vicious rival, Alex, to a tournament. The story is a delicate balance between the tension of the game and the strained relationship with his brother.

movies.title: Whipped
movies.summary: Andovi, Tommy, Jovi, and Chandra try to get out of unhealthy relationships because they are "bucin" (slaves of love). They decide to take the "antibucin" class so they can have a more mature relationship, and not be enslaved by love. It turns out that the method of teaching, taught by Vania, is very extreme. Even threatening their love and friendship relationships.

movies.title: Fan
movies.summary: Gaurav a boy from Delhi is a die hard fan of Bollywood superstar Aryan Khanna. He comes to Mumbai to wish his idol on his Birthday, but over there things got worst and Gaurav's obsession turned himself a man who wants to create chaos in Aryan Khanna's life.

movies.title: Upgrade
movies.summary: Grey's a stay-at-home mechanic, whose wife is Asha. One day, Grey asks Asha to help him return a car to his client. Whilst Grey and Asha's self-driving car malfunctions, it crashes. Grey watches helplessly as Asha bleeds to death next to him. Grey returns home - a widowed quadriplegic, under the care of his mother. His wife''s death and the inability of police to identify their attackers cause him to sink into a depression. After a suicide attempt, he's offered to have high tech chip implanted - enabling him to walk. Though initially hesitant, he's persuaded to have the surgery..

movies.title: An Acrid Yarn
movies.summary: Based on real events in a small town where the pastor takes advantage of his female flock.
